docs.snippet: Thousands of people waited for hours in single-digit temperatures on Saturday to try to get a ticket to President Barack Obama's farewell speech in his hometown of Chicago, saying they want to show their appreciation and soak in the final moments ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Thousands of people waited for hours in single-digit temperatures on Saturday to try to get a ticket to President Barack Obama's farewell speech in his hometown of Chicago, saying they want to show their appreciation and soak in the final moments of his history-making presidency.

headline.main: Thousands Brave Cold for Tickets to Obama Farewell Speech
headline.print_headline: Thousands Brave Cold for Tickets to Obama Farewell Speech

docs.snippet: Real Madrid equalled a Spanish record of 39 games unbeaten in all competitions by crushing struggling Granada 5-0 on Saturday to go six points clear at the top of La Liga....
docs.lead_paragraph: Real Madrid equalled a Spanish record of 39 games unbeaten in all competitions by crushing struggling Granada 5-0 on Saturday to go six points clear at the top of La Liga.

headline.main: Real Thrash Granada to Equal Record; Griezmann Ends Goal Drought
headline.print_headline: Real Thrash Granada to Equal Record; Griezmann Ends Goal Drought

docs.snippet: Wayne Rooney left his footprint on FA Cup third-round day with the first goal in holders Manchester United's 4-0 rout of Championship side Reading on Saturday to draw level with Bobby Charlton as the club's record scorer....
docs.lead_paragraph: Wayne Rooney left his footprint on FA Cup third-round day with the first goal in holders Manchester United's 4-0 rout of Championship side Reading on Saturday to draw level with Bobby Charlton as the club's record scorer.

headline.main: Rooney Record in United Rout, Leicester Win at Everton

headline.main: Gasquet Inspires France to Second Hopman Cup Title

docs.snippet: A witness fearing retribution in the murder trial of wealthy real estate scion Robert Durst, whose ties to several slayings were chronicled in HBO's documentary "The Jinx," will be allowed to testify without revealing his or her identity, a Los An...
docs.lead_paragraph: A witness fearing retribution in the murder trial of wealthy real estate scion Robert Durst, whose ties to several slayings were chronicled in HBO's documentary "The Jinx," will be allowed to testify without revealing his or her identity, a Los Angeles judge  ruled on Friday.

headline.main: Witness May Testify Incognito in Robert Durst of 'The Jinx' Murder Trial
headline.print_headline: Witness May Testify Incognito in Robert Durst of 'The Jinx' Murder Trial

docs.snippet: Police in Alaska took a handgun from the man accused of killing five people at Fort Lauderdale's airport on Friday, but they returned it to him last month after a medical evaluation found he was not mentally ill, authorities said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police in Alaska took a handgun from the man accused of killing five people at Fort Lauderdale's airport on Friday, but they returned it to him last month after a medical evaluation found he was not mentally ill, authorities said on Saturday.

headline.main: Gun Was Given Back to Florida Shooting Suspect Last Month
